title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends a magical school.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A hobbit embarks on a journey to help dwarves reclaim their home.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian society where the government watches everything.

title: The Catcher in the Rye

description: A troubled young man navigates teenage angst in New York.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A story of love and societal expectations in 19th century England.
